ideas.title: [AppIdea] A calendar app to show if you took your daily/weekly/monthly pill. -- by ricky
ideas.abstract: A calendar app to show if you took your daily/weekly/monthly pill. It has a FE which allows you to configure your pills (eg "pressure pill - daily" and "mounjaro - weekly on wed") after which it prompts you on the day: did you take your pill? And if you say no, it keeps bugging you until you do.
